KINNITA OMA E-POSTI AADRESS
Your email address ${email} was used to register as a ${brand_service}.

To complete the registration, it is necessary that you verify your e-mail
address by clicking on the button below.

Please note that upon successful verification of your e-mail, your
${brand_service} account is still subject to approval through our staff, which
usually happens within 24 hours. You will be informed of the approval via a
separate e-mail.

Kinnita [${url}]Kui sul pole võimalik nuppu klikkida, siis kopeeri allolev
aadress veebibrauserisse:

${url}

If you didn’t register for a ${brand} service provider account using this e-mail
address, you can safely ignore this message. If you want to report abuse of your
e-mail address, please contact us. [${support}]

Palun ära sellele kirjale vasta.
